item.title: RDP: An internal error has occurred
item.description: RDP: An internal error has occurred Problem overview One of my colleagues hit me up about an issue they were seeing when trying to RDP into a DC. The error from RDP was “An internal error has occurred”. Totally useful right :-). We could console in so that was a slight sigh of relief. Other symptoms When I consoled into the system and look at the event logs, the following event entry was created after each RDP attempt.
